description._content: The context of the display is unknown. However, the two women in the photo are Mrs. Arthur Horwitz (left) and Mrs. H.Z. Mendow (right). Note the photos in the background display featuring prominent Minneapolis Jewish leaders, including Rabbi Solomon Silber, Joseph Shandfield and Rabbi Samuel Deinard. Below the portraits are photos of Minneapolis synagogues and the first Jewish Sheltering home. Date: 194? Coverage: Minnesota; United States Local Identifier: MHS554 Link to our record: http://reflections.mndigital.org/u?/jhs,499 From the Steinfeldt Photography Collection of the Jewish Historical Society of the Upper Midwest.
